reviewText: Absolutely breathtaking. This movie puts you in the center of one of the most daring and dramatic rescues in modern military history. Highly recommended!

I bought this as part of an "Entebbe cluster" to add to my military flicks collection.

I felt I took a chance, seeing next to no description in the product listing, but one never knows.

I found out it's a TV documentary, an episode of the National Geographic Channel documentary series "Situation Critical".

Good, tight coverage including interviews with not just Israeli hostages, but with individual troopers taking part in the raid.  Decent graphics showing how the raid unfolded according to witnesses and sources.
Absolutely breathtaking. This movie puts you in the center of one of the most daring and dramatic rescues in modern military history. Highly recommended!

I bought this as part of an "Entebbe cluster" to add to my military flicks collection.

I felt I took a chance, seeing next to no description in the product listing, but one never knows.

I found out it's a TV documentary, an episode of the National Geographic Channel documentary series "Situation Critical".

Good, tight coverage including interviews with not just Israeli hostages, but with individual troopers taking part in the raid.  Decent graphics showing how the raid unfolded according to witnesses and sources.

An excellent detailed historical account of this amazing rescue performed by Israel's elite special forces that set a new world standard for these types of military operations. It does, however, get somewhat long-winded and repeats itself in places.
Good documentation, vis-a-vis the actual footage.  Clears out some misinformation appearing in other sources. A restoration would greatly enhance the quality and value of this document.
Well made emotional true story.  Exciting and inspirational.
As I was actually there, it is the documentary which seems to be the closest to the truth up to now.
I would have rather seen the "movie". This was the documentary. I thought it was OK, informative, but nothing special.
superbly documented and factual. Invaluable informative with information and tidbits not acknowledge in the news. makes me want to visit Israel now
